data.field: go to Heaven check-in to Hades lounge at the bar in Purgatory be reborn be reduced to ashes slowly rot in a coffin swim with the fishes haunt my enemies, spouse, and/or friends merge with the universe display an error message then return control to the shell check in at [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Milliways#Milliways|Milliways] and wait for the universe to end
